mapper.select: select s.member_id, m.member_nickname, s.profile_picpath, s.profile_content, s.list_address, s.profile_picpath, s.profile_picname from sitter_profile s, member m where s.member_id = m.member_id

select s.member_id, s.profile_picpath, s.profile_picname, s.profile_title, s.profile_content, s.price_small, s.price_medium, s.price_large, s.list_address, s.profile_jibunAddress, s.service_00, s.service_01, s.service_02, s.service_03, s.service_04, s.service_05, s.service_06, s.service_07, m.member_nickname from sitter_profile s, member m where s.member_id = #{member_ID} and s.member_id = m.member_id
mapper.insert: insert into sitter_profile (member_id, profile_picpath, profile_content, price_small, price_medium, price_large, profile_roadaddress, profile_jibunaddress, profile_detailaddress, list_address, service_00, service_01, service_02, service_03, service_04, service_05, service_06, service_07) values(#{member_ID}, #{profile_PicPath}, #{profile_Content}, #{price_Small}, #{price_Medium}, #{price_Large}, #{profile_RoadAddress}, #{profile_JibunAddress}, #{profile_DetailAddress}, #{list_Address}, #{service_00}, #{service_01}, #{service_02}, #{service_03}, #{service_04}, #{service_05}, #{service_06}, #{service_07})

insert into license (member_id, license_id, license_picpath, license_name, license_agency, license_date) values(#{member_ID}, seq_license.nextval, #{license_PicPath}, #{license_Name}, #{license_Agency}, #{license_Date})

insert into service (member_id, service_00, service_01, service_02, service_03, service_04, service_05, service_06, service_07) values(#{member_ID}, #{petService[0]}, #{petService[1]}, #{petService[2]}, #{petService[3]}, #{petService[4]}, #{petService[5]}, #{petService[6]}, #{petService[7]})
insert into schedule (member_id, schedule_id, schedule_closed) values(#{member_ID}, seq_schedule.nextval, #{schedule_Closed})
mapper.select: select r.order_id, m.member_nickname, m.member_photo, r.review_content, r.review_date, r.review_Star from member m, reservation r where m.member_id = r.member_id and sitter_id = #{member_ID} and r.review_id is not null order by r.review_date
